text:
<@U01QVR44MEY> I had this error here ,
`{"status":"error","message":"This oauth-token (pat-na1-8e846) does not have proper permissions! (requires all of [developers-read])","correlationId":"e4c518ed-d3a5-4896-bde4-aa52f84375a7"}`
Which endpoint are you using?
crm/v3/timeline/${appId}/event-templates/

yes so that endpoint is meant to be used in conjunction with a marketplace app, have you created your app yet? Once you create the app you'll create the event templates using the developer API key not a private app
Can I use the api call inside a CRM-CARD?
is the crm card a normal crm card, or a dev project card? You could technically do it with both options but a normal crm card would be easier
events are driven entirely by the marketplace app and oauth that's included with those apps
It's a dev project card
So I can't use a private application id for this call ?
No
Not for timeline events
You could use behavioral events though, which are per portal, and support private apps
Can I use this behavioral event to insert into activities? Like in the image?
yep you would see it there
Great, thaks for help
of course
<@U046M66LWTD> ability to re-name custom tab is already being considered, we will keep this channel posted about it.
<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C04A3FUK8HK/p1677078091693709?thread_ts=1676727561.244409&cid=C04A3FUK8HK>
I am not succeeding with this api call.
I have created a behavioral event and am trying to insert this event into a deal
Here's an example of what a behavior event request should look like
And are you trying to use with deals? I thought you were trying to use with contacts

Currently behavioral events only work with contacts... Timeline events work with contacts, companies, and deals though, but again you'll need to create everything through a marketplace app (you don't need to publish the app though)
Ok, tanks again
of course
